Alert Name: bush
Lawmakers seek probe of Chinese currency
Reps. Rangel, Levin ask the Bush administration to formally investigate currency practices.
05/17/07 07:26 PM, EDT
Lawmakers asked the Bush administration Thursday to formally investigate whether China's currency practices violate global trade rules, raising the temperature of a spring meeting next week between senior U.S. and Chinese officials.
